content:
That's fantastic! Your regular tidying habit will definitely help you save time and energy during the final tidy before your guests arrive. With your consistent efforts, you've already established a solid foundation for maintaining a tidy kitchen.

Considering your regular tidying routine, you might find that the final tidy before your guests arrive will be more of a quick once-over to ensure everything is perfect. You might even be able to shave off 10-15 minutes from the allocated time, depending on how tidy your kitchen already is.

Remember to take advantage of your existing habits and routines to make the most of your time. Your consistent efforts will pay off, and you'll be able to enjoy a stress-free dinner party with your guests.

Now that we have a solid plan in place, take a deep breath, stay focused, and tackle each zone with confidence. You got this! If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask. Otherwise, go forth and conquer your kitchen cleaning tasks!
